Establish each of the following claims:

a. $\proves_{\p^-} \ph\imp(\psi\imp\ph)$

b. $\proves_{\p^-} (\ph\imp(\psi\imp\chi))\imp((\ph\imp\psi)\imp(\ph\imp\chi))$

c. $\proves_{\p^-} (\neg\ph\imp\neg\psi)\imp(\psi\imp\ph)$

Conclude from (a)-(c) above that if $\Ga\proveshp\ph$, then $\Ga\proves_{\p^-}\ph$.
